title: Calendar (com.apple.caldav.account)
description: The payload that configures a Calendar account.

CalDAVPrincipalURL.title: Principal URL
CalDAVPrincipalURL.description: The base URL to the user's calendar.

CalDAVUsername.title: Account Username
CalDAVUsername.description: The user name for logins. If this profile is part of a non-interactive install, the system requires this field.

CalDAVPassword.title: Account Password
CalDAVPassword.description: The user's password. Only use this in encrypted profiles.

VPNUUID.title: VPNUUID
VPNUUID.description: The VPNUUID of the per-app VPN the account uses for network communication. Available in iOS 14 and later.
